message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal considering its value to me. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope this revised offer works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is a bit too low for me. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am still unable to go above $8,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
